string.value: We need someone that can reveal the truth, said #p2111001#. He then proceeded to tell me a story about #p2111002#. According to him, #p2111002# was in close contact with #p2111007# before he turned up missing, which means I'll have to go see #b#p2111007##k. In order to talk to Han the Broker, I'll have to come up with some mesos...

I don't think I can totally trust you... but maybe that's the reason why I can let you work on this. I want you to see #p2111002# in a 3rd person's point of view, unaffiliated with the past of Zenumist and Alcadno, what he wanted, and make a decision on whether it was the right thing to do.

Apparently, just before he went missing, #p2111002# had been in close contact with a suspicious character. Have you heard of #r#p2111007##k? ...he's a man with a very questionable reputation. Regardless, I also hear that he is very trustworthy in business deals, so I think he'll be good. You may get some information on #p2111002# through him...

Oh, and... know this one thing. #p2111007# loves money. He doesn't even speak to people that don't have a substantial amount of mesos with them, so I highly advise you to prepare some before the meeting.
Are you too afraid to encounter the truth? If so, then there's nothing I can do... maybe it's a wise thing not to pursue matters on #p2111002# any further.

...Just tell me what you want, and I'll get it for you. An item? Information? Dirt on someone? Just tell me anything, and I'll get it for you. What? A missing alchemist? You mean, #p2111002#... ? Hmm... yes. He frequently visited yours truly just before his disappearance. Anyway, what about it? What? You want some information on #p2111002#?
Fine. The information will cost you #b50,000 mesos#k. If you pay up the fee, then I'll give you the information as promised.

Tsk tsk... This is definitely an unexpected source of income. This is good! Now, as promised, I'll give you the information on #p2111002#, as long as you're ready to pay me. Come see me when you're ready.
You haven't gone to #b#p2111007##k yet? He's a salesperson... one that sells the darkness of evil... so you won't be able to talk to him without money.
